info.title: spall
info.description: Local semantic note store with embeddings

post.description: Get or create a workspace. Returns existing workspace if name matches, creates new one otherwise.

get.description: Look up a workspace by name or id.
List all note paths in a corpus.
List notes under a path prefix with keyset pagination. Returns full note content.
Get a note by path within a corpus.

put.description: Create or update a note by path. Creates if not exists, updates if exists.

post.description: Get or create a corpus. Returns existing corpus if name matches, creates new one otherwise.

get.description: Look up a corpus by name or id. Returns default corpus if neither specified.

delete.description: Delete a corpus and all associated notes by ID.

post.description: Scan a directory, add matching notes, remove non-matches
Add a note to a corpus and embed it. Requires corpus ID.

get.description: Get a note by its globally unique ID.

put.description: Update a note's content by ID. Re-embeds the content.

post.description: Create a query scope for aggregating notes across multiple corpora.

get.description: Get the most recently created queries.
List notes across all corpora in a query with keyset pagination.
Search note content across all corpora in a query using FTS5.
Semantic search across all corpora in a query using embeddings.

post.description: Fetch full note content for a list of note IDs through a query scope. Records access for reweighting.

get.description: List all note paths across corpora in a query, grouped by corpus.

post.description: Move all rows from staging to committed.
Scan a directory and embed all matching notes. Streams progress events.
Add a note to a corpus and embed it. Streams progress events.

put.description: Create or update a note by path. Streams progress events.
Update a note's content by ID. Re-embeds the content. Streams progress events.

get.description: Check if the server is running
Subscribe to all server events via SSE
